name: Pico Of The Beast
description:
Making 40 Pico-8 carts in 2018! This is cart #2.

A Pico-8 demo of the famous multilayer scrolling from the 1989 Amiga game Shadow Of The Beast. 

It's just a demo to see if I could get all the layers working so there's no game proper, but you can still wander around the looping landscape and chill to the music.
